TextBlock.Text: KASILI: I can't tell anyone else, but I think I'm having doubts about this project...
KASILI: When I was in engineering school, I was taught, "first, do no harm."
KASILI: After the attack, everybody seems to have forgotten that in the name of getting revenge.
KASILI: There has to be a better, more measured and peaceful response than basically firing a giant laser through another species home system!
KASILI: Is this the way we want to spend our dwindling resources?
